text.data-name: A young attacking player of outstanding all-round quality who can create and score goals, his first year at Stamford Bridge could hardly have gone better as he was awarded Player of the Season and became a full England international. In July 2024, he scor
text.tspan: A young attacking player of outstanding all-round quality who can create and score
goals, his first year at Stamford Bridge could hardly have gone better as he was
awarded Player of the Season and became a full England international. In July 2024, he
scored for his nation in the European Championship final versus Spain.
Ahead of the start of the 2024/25 campaign, there was good news for Chelsea fans
when Palmer signed a two-year contract extension, committing him to the club until

text.data-name: Cole Palmer joined from Manchester City on transfer deadline day in September 2023
text.tspan: Cole Palmer joined from Manchester City on transfer
